thing-type.label: Gallileo Arduino Sensor
thing-type.description: Binding for a Intel Galileo with Temperature and Light Sensors and a LED.

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Sensor-IP
parameter.description: IP of the Galileo Arduino Sensor in your local network.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The Port at which the Binding should communicate with the Galileo Sensor.

parameter.name: measurement
parameter.label: Einheit der Temperaturmessung
parameter.description: This value describes in which unit, the Temperature is measured at the Sensor

channel-type.label: Temperature
channel-type.description: Current Temperature measured by the Arduino Sensor.

channel-type.label: Light Intensity
channel-type.description: Current Light Intensity measured by the Arduino Sensor.

channel-type.label: Brightness Threshold
channel-type.description: Darkness (upper limit) at which the Galileo should start an acoustic warning signal.
